Olukayode "Kayode" Ajulo bụ onye ọkaiwu Naijiria, onye na-ekpe ikpe na onye na-akwado ikike obodo
Ọ bụ onye otu nke Chartered Institute of Arbitrators. Ọ bụ Diocesan Registrar of the Anglican Communion, Church of Nigeria.
A mụrụ Ajulo na Christiana Monisola O
Ajulo O nwetara nzere bachelọ na Iwu na Mahadum Jos n'afọ 1999. N'afọ 2001, ógè ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ iwu Naịjirịa n'afọ 2000, a kpọrọ ya na Nigerian Bar
O nwetara nzere masta nke iwu n'afọ 2006 na Mahadum Jos
Ajulo bu onye nkuzi na Adekunle Ajasin University, Akungba-Akoko, Ondo State na Egalitarian Basic Studies Institute, Kumasi, Ghana
N'afọ 2013, Gọvanọ nke Ondo Steeti họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ Radiovision Corporation.
Ajulo bụ nwa akwụkwọ PhD na School of Law na Middlesex University London
Ajulo bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onye otu Labour Party maka oche sineti FCT nke emere n'ubochí itoolu n'ọnwa Eprel 2011.
N'ụbọchị nke asaa n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011, a kọrọ na ndị ikom bu ngwá agha tọọrọ Ajulo. Nke a mere ka ndị ọrụ Abuja nke ndị Nigeria Labour Congress na-edu kwụsị ntuli aka ahụ

N'okwu nke ndị isi nke Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) Abuja council, a gwara ndị ọrụ niile na ndị mmekọ n'ókèala ahụ ka ha kwụsị ntuli aka nke Nzukọ mba awa iri na isii tupu ntuli aka na mba ahụ n'ihi ịtọrọ Kayode Ajulo.
Ajulo lụrụ di ihe karịrị afọ iri abụọ.
